    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdoptAPet
    AdoptAPet allows users to select and adopt an available pet.
    AdoptFrame
    AdoptFrame displays the list of pets available for adoption.
    AdoptionController
    AdoptionController acts as the intermediary between the UI and the data model.
    Cat
    Cat is a subclass of Pet representing a cat in the shelter.
    Dog
    Dog is a subclass of Pet representing a dog in the shelter.
    ExoticAdapter
    ExoticAdapter adapts an ExoticAnimal object to the Pet interface so that exotic animals can be treated like standard pets within the system.
    ExoticAnimal
    ExoticAnimal is a subclass of Pet that represents animals not typically categorized as standard pets.
    MainFrame
    MainFrame is the homepage of the Pet Adoption System.
    ManagePets
    ManagePets is the interface used to add, remove, view, and save adoptable animals.
    Pet
    Abstract class representing a generic Pet.
    Pet.Type
     
    PetAdapter
     
    PetDeserializer
    PetDeserializer is a custom deserializer for the Pet class hierarchy.
    Rabbit
    Rabbit is a subclass of Pet representing rabbit-type animals in the shelter.
    ReadingDataFromJSONusingGsonLibrary
    A simple utility class that demonstrates how to load pet data from JSON files using the Gson library.
    Shelter<T>
    Shelter is a generic class that manages a list of pets.
